title: Be league buddies?
body:
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}} 

Hey guys, 

Just looking for an OCE league buddy that is chill and down to play league together. Hard to make friends in normal games so I thought I'd give the forum a go. I'm not salty at all so don't stress about flame! 

I'm also in the process of climbing from Gold IV so if you're interested, wanna be duo buddies? I main Jinx ADC and mid lane, I also play support so I'm versatile with 3 lanes. 

Just add my summoner (mitzirella) if you're keen to play this trash game together

replies.body: Hey man, I’m not really good at league (silver 4 once I’m finished placements) but I’m always looking for new people to play with, my irl’s are kinda toxic and I don’t like that. I play a bit of everything. However I can’t add you right now because my league client is glitching out and won’t open. But I’ll add as soon as I can :)
